weather_clean

Source: R/yield_impacts_functions.R
weather_clean.Rd

Function to clean the input weather files (historic and model projections) for regression analysis

Usage

weather_clean(
  file = NULL,
  crop_name = NULL,
  weather_var = NULL,
  irr_type = NULL,
  time_periods = NULL
)

Arguments

file

Default = NULL. String for the path to the climate file

crop_name

Default = NULL. String for the crop name

weather_var

Default = NULL. String for the weather var name

irr_type

Default = NULL. String for the irrigation type. Options: 'irr', 'rf'

time_periods

Default = NULL. vector for years to subset from the climate data. If NULL, use the default climate data period

On this page
